original_title: Murales En Movimiento. José Clemente Orozco Y Las Hermanas Campobello
overview: Murals in movement, is a documentaryl that shows the unpublished scenographic art of the painter José Clemente Orozco, when he worked as an scenographer for the Ballet of Mexico City that was directed by Nellie and Gloria Campobello.
title: Murales En Movimiento. José Clemente Orozco Y Las Hermanas Campobello
